name: EXENO COIN
description: To enable fast and convenient payments in crypto and to use all the benefits of DeFi available, we need a multi-blockchain cryptocurrency. This EIP-1363 multi-blockchain coin currently sits on BNB Chain, Ethereum, and Polygon, and strives to be fully blockchain agnostic shortly. It connects the entire exeno ecosystem and allows you to take full advantage of the world of exeno finance.
